courses.title: French Beginner
courses.description: This is a beginner training for French pronunciation

courses.title: French Intermediate
courses.description: This is an intermediate training for French pronunciation
content: Les œuvres de Monet sont célèbres.
Je préfère le vin rouge au vin blanc.
J'ai visité le château de Versailles.

courses.title: French Advanced
courses.description: This is an advanced training for French pronunciation
content: La prononciation des mots difficiles en français.
La poésie de Baudelaire est obscure.
Le débat politique en France est animé.
L'histoire de la Révolution est compliquée.
La littérature française est riche en symbolisme.
La phonétique française demande de la précision.

courses.title: Spanish Beginner
courses.description: This is a beginner training for Spanish pronunciation
content: Vamos a la playa el fin de semana.

courses.title: Spanish Intermediate
courses.description: This is an intermediate training for Spanish pronunciation
content: He visitado la Alhambra en Granada.
La historia de América Latina es fascinante.
El cine español tiene películas destacadas.
He probado el ceviche en Perú.
La literatura de García Márquez es profunda.
La pronunciación de las 'rr' es un reto.

courses.title: Spanish Advanced
courses.description: This is an advanced training for Spanish pronunciation
content: El surrealismo en el arte es intrigante.
Las políticas de América Latina varían.
Las obras de Borges son metafísicas.
Estudié el realismo mágico en profundidad.
Participé en proyectos de ayuda humanitaria.
La poesía de Neruda es apasionada.
Exploré la selva amazónica en una expedición.
Entendí las lenguas indígenas en México.

courses.title: Portuguese Beginner
courses.description: This is a beginner training for Portuguese pronunciation
content: Gosto de comer pão de queijo.
Vamos à praia no fim de semana.

courses.title: Portuguese Intermediate
courses.description: This is an intermediate training for Portuguese pronunciation
content: A história do Brasil é fascinante.
O cinema brasileiro produz filmes diversos.
A poesia de Drummond é profunda.
A música bossa nova é suave.
A pronúncia das vogais é um desafio.

courses.title: Portuguese Advanced
courses.description: This is an advanced training for Portuguese pronunciation
content: A literatura de Machado de Assis é complexa.
As questões políticas no Brasil são variadas.
Visitei a Floresta Amazônica em uma expedição.
A música de Caetano Veloso é inovadora.
Traduzi obras literárias complexas para o português.
Participei de projetos de preservação da Amazônia.
A cultura indígena brasileira é diversificada.
Entendi a influência africana na cultura brasileira.
Explorei as praias do Nordeste do Brasil.
A pronúncia das consoantes é desafiadora.

courses.title: English Beginner
courses.description: This is a beginner training for English pronunciation
content: I have a dog named Max.
I can count to ten in English.
I want to visit London someday.
I enjoy listening to pop music.

courses.title: English Intermediate
courses.description: This is an intermediate training for English pronunciation
content: I've traveled to New York City.
I enjoy hiking in the mountains.
I'm planning a trip to Japan.
I like to read science fiction novels.
I can have basic conversations in English.
I want to improve my pronunciation.

courses.title: English Advanced
courses.description: This is an advanced training for English pronunciation
content: I've published articles in academic journals.
I've given presentations at international conferences.
I'm fluent in English, French, and Spanish.
I'm pursuing a PhD in English literature.
I enjoy discussing linguistics and phonetics.
I've taught English at the university level.
